name: Chaolf
description:
Chaolf

It's golf! Get your ball to the hole before your opponent does. Use left & right to choose a club, 'X' to rotate your aim, and 'O' to shoot. Act fast!

Default Pico-8 controls:

Player 1
U/L/D/R: Arrow keys
'X' : x
'O': z

Player 2
U/L/D/R: e/s/d/f
'X': q
'O': Tab

Created by Muh Boys for the TOY BOX JAM 2020.
